lead_paragraph: TANNENBAUM--Rose, age 102, of Lexington, on Saturday March, 12, 2016. Beloved wife of the late David Tannenbaum. Cherished mother of Beth Mazer of Lexington, and Mark Tannenbaum of Hastings-on- Hudson, NY. Adoring grandmother of Sasha, Finn, and Jade. Graveside services will be on Monday at Riverside Cemetery, Saddle Brook, NJ. Levine Chapels, Brookline 617-277-8300. www.levinechapel.com 1/3
